message: Let's split it 50/50 to start with, a fair and simple proposal
I'll give you a small share, but I'm looking for a bigger slice of the pie
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share. How about 60/40?
I'm still looking for a bigger share, but I'm willing to give you a bit more than last time
I'm not willing to give up much more, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about 70/30?

I'm not going to give up much more, but I'm willing to make a slightly more generous offer. How about 80/20?

I'm not going to accept such an unfair offer. I'm willing to give you a tiny share, but I want a significant majority. How about 99/1?
